com.objetdirect.tatami.client.gfx
Class Text

java.lang.Object
  com.objetdirect.tatami.client.gfx.GraphicObject
      com.objetdirect.tatami.client.gfx.Text

public class Text
extends GraphicObject

Represents some text in a graphical environment. The text can have a specific font and a decoration.

Author:
Vianney TODO the decoration attribute doesn't seem to work even in pur JavaScript

getBounds

public Rectangle getBounds()
Returns approximative bounds of this text. The DOJO GFX text return a null Rectangle for the bounds. So the method is overriden to return an aproximative Rectangle. The bounds are calculated from the font size. The rectangle is approximative because, font ascent and font descent are not known.

Overrides:
getBounds in class GraphicObject
Returns:
a Rectangle
